    level="1"
    right="Item 1+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Silvertongue Mutagen](/Equipment.aspx?ID=3321)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=528" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=564" />
<trait label="Elixir" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=589" />
<trait label="Mutagen" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=808" />
<trait label="Polymorph" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=670" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 290 <sup>1.1</sup>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>([manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=104))</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Your features become striking, and your voice becomes musical and commanding, though emotion clouds your reason. 

**Benefit** You gain an item bonus to [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=38), [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=39), [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=40), and [Performance](/Skills.aspx?ID=45) checks. Your critical failures with any of these skills become failures instead. 

**Drawback** You take a –2 penalty to [Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=35), [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=37), [Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=41), [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=44), and [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=47) checks. Choose one skill in which you're trained; for the duration, you become untrained in that skill.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
